derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French scinc or Latin scincus, from Greek skinkos

means.word_mean: 1. alert agile lizard with reduced limbs and an elongated body covered with shiny scales; more dependent on moisture than most lizards; found in tropical regions worldwide
